ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] OT - Equipment question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ll forgive the Off-Topic, but misspell my name again, and I ll sing my own version of CoD outside your window at 2am ;) Do not trifle with Bards, for we
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:26 PM 6/12/2001 -0400, you wrote:
>Tallies, I figured this a topic of interest even if not directly related
>to barding. Bards do provide a lot of input into what is seen in game
>graphically, so this can be an important topic.
>
>I have a 450 mhz P3 Gateway with 128 MB Ram and Voodoo 3000 16 MB AGP
>graphics card. I can't get a new computer. But more memory and a better
>graphics card are in reach due to Father's day. I just got 128 MB Ram -
>done. So now I want to get my fellow bards input on what graphics cards
>they use, have used and performance rating. Brand, MB, speed, anything
>else of note would be much appreciated. Currently, framerate in WW and
>some places in FV sucks - I auto follow, look down and hope they don't
>scrape me off on a tree. I can't imagine Luclin without a better card.
>
>Thanks again for all the help,
>
>Piemur Draggonsinger 42 bard
>Robiinton Masterrhealer 32 cleric


I'll forgive the Off-Topic, but misspell my name again, and I'll sing my
own version of CoD outside your window at 2am ;)
Do not trifle with Bards, for we are not subtle, and your name scans to
Greensleeves.

Nice names on your part, though. Dragonriders fan, I see.

Anyway - as to your request, I can't recommend something, but I can
recommend AGAINST anything by 3dfx. Not only are they no more, but their
technology is receiving no more support (the end of opengl?)

I'm also looking forward to some good suggestions - I want to upgrade, too ;)

Talies the Wanderer (12th Level Bard)
